body:
On 10/12/12 8:22 AM, "javed iqbal" <javedvit at gmail.com<mailto:javedvit at gmail.com>> wrote:


Also when i tried to run the simulation it says "Ruby and Radiance are required"..From where i can download these two installation file.




Hi Javed,


Here are some links for you:


Radiance:
https://openstudio.nrel.gov/getting-started-developer/getting-started-radiance


Perl (just in case, assuming you're on Windows. If on Mac or Linux you probably already have Perl installed):
http://www.activestate.com/activeperl/downloads/thank-you?dl=http://downloads.activestate.com/ActivePerl/releases/5.16.1.1601/ActivePerl-5.16.1.1601-MSWin32-x86-296175.msi


- Rob
